caller_intent: The caller is concerned about a past-due bill and wants to confirm that their scheduled automatic payment on the 31st will prevent their auto insurance policy from being canceled on the same day.
resolution_steps: Agent asked for the policyholder's name (Morgan Bohannon) and confirmed it's an auto policy.
Agent requested a moment to check the account and locate an agent to assist further.
knowledge_required: Understanding of payment scheduling and policy cancellation processes
Access to internal systems to verify account details
summary: Caller is concerned about a past-due auto insurance bill and scheduled payment on the 31st potentially leading to policy cancellation. Agent is verifying account details and will connect with another agent to resolve the issue.
